test.name: Test01 Ajouter un utilisateur

kw.name: Ouvrir Orange_HRM
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
Ouverture de Chrome à l'adresse https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com Connexion à la plateforme OrangeHRM avec les identifiants Admin/admin123

kw.name: Given Aller sur la page Admin
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: When Clicker sur le bouton "+ Add"
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Remplir le formulaire d'ajout d'utilisateur
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'James' into text field 'xpath=//label[text()='Employee Name']/following::input[1]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'test123' into text field 'xpath=//label[text()='Confirm Password']/following::input[1]'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Vérifier que l'utilisateur est bien ajouté
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Fermer Orange_HRM
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Fermeture du navigateur On laisse un peu de temps pour visualiser l'écran final

test.doc:
Ajout d'un utilisateur
Cliquer sur le bouton "+ Add" dans la section "User Management"
Remplir le formulaire d'ajout d'utilisateur
Vérifier que l'utilisateur est bien ajouté
